content.prompt: Nan Madol is believed to have primarily functioned as a

choices.label: ceremonial and administrative center of a royal dynasty
religious complex that was devoted to ancestor worship
trade center where ships and navigation charts were produced
sacred enclave where women produced tapa cloths

topic.text: 9.2: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Pacific Art

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe contextual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. function.  b. context.  c. siting or physical context.  d. subject matter.  e. reception.
